meanings.definition: A drawing technique using a silver stylus on specially prepared paper.
meanings.sent1: She created a beautiful silverpoint artwork in art class.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully used a silverpoint to sketch the intricate details.
meanings.sent3: The silverpoint drawing of a cat made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her silverpoint technique was as precise as a surgeon's scalpel.
meanings.sent5: The shimmer of the silverpoint drawing caught the light just right.

meanings.definition: A stylus used in silverpoint drawing.
meanings.sent1: He delicately held the silverpoint to start his masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The silverpoint glided smoothly across the paper, leaving a trail of silver.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student pretended the silverpoint was a magic wand.
meanings.sent4: The silverpoint seemed to dance on the paper, bringing the artwork to life.
meanings.sent5: The artist's hand trembled slightly as the silverpoint touched the canvas.
